meta.description: ProppyJS: JavaScript library for functional composition of props for UI components
meta.keywords: javascript, library, react.js, vue.js, preact, rxjs, composition, props, framework

og.title: ProppyJS: Functional props composition for UI components
og.description: ProppyJS is a tiny 1.5kB JavaScript library for functionally composing props for your UI components. Supporting integrations with React.js, Vue.js, Preact, Redux, and RxJS.
